content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia function extract_julia_code(md::AbstractString)
 # Use RegularExpressions to find code blocks
 code_blocks_pattern = r"```(.*?)```"
 matches = match.(md, code_blocks_pattern)

 # Initialize an empty String to store the extracted code
 extracted_code = ""

 # Iterate through matches to extract and join code blocks
 for match in matches
     # Remove code fences and join the code block with a newline if there are multiple
     code_block = match.match
     if occursin("```julia", code_block)
         extracted_code *= replace(code_block, r"^```(.*?)```\n$", replace(replace(Sys.readstring(match.offset:match.offset+length(match.match)-1), r"\n\n"=>"\n"), "\n"=>"")) * "\n"
     end
 end

 # Return the extracted code
 extracted_code
end
```
